file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 33-29-01-04 - GALLEY CONTROL MODULE - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL GALLEY CONTROL MODULE - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the galley control module. B. The galley control module is installed at the galley and controls the galley area lights. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 33-29-01-000-801-A GALLEY CONTROL MODULE - REMOVAL GALLEY CONTROL MODULE - INSTALLA- ALL 33-29-01-400-801-A TION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 33-29-01 Page 1 of 8 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-29-01-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. GALLEY CONTROL MODULE - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to remove the galley control module. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM SDS 24-60-00/1 C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Passenger cabin I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) On the RH electrical-power control/distribution box (AMM SDS 24-60-00/1), open the circuit breakers below and attach a DO-NOT-CLOSE tag to them. • GALLEY (Location Tip: RB SHED DC BUS 2/GALLEY). • GALLEY (Location Tip: RB SERVBUS/GALLEY). J. Removal SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) For the removal of the aft galley control module and the forward galley control module, do as follows (Figure 401) (Figure 402): (a) Release the three Dzus fasteners (2). (b) Carefully pull the galley control module (3). (c) Disconnect the electrical connector (1). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 33-29-01 Page 2 of 8 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (d) Remove the galley control module (3). (2) For the removal of the outboard galley control module, do as follows (Figure 403): (a) Release the four Dzus fasteners (2). (b) Carefully pull the galley control module (3). (c) Disconnect the electrical connector (1). (d) Remove the galley control module (3). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 33-29-01 Page 3 of 8 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

GALLEY CONTROL MODULE DET. B 145AMM330209.MCE EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 33-29-01 Page 5 of 8 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH OUTBOARD GALLEY Outboard Galley Control Module - Removal/Installation Figure 403 B OUTBOARD A GALLEY ZONE 232 DET. A 3. GALLEY CONTROL MODULE 1. ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR DET. B 2. DZUS FASTENER (4) 145AMM330203.MCE EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 33-29-01 Page 6 of 8 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-29-01-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. GALLEY CONTROL MODULE - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to install the galley control module. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM SDS 24-60-00/1 AMM TASK 33-29-00-700-801-A/500 GALLEY LIGHTS - OPERATIONAL TEST C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Passenger cabin I. Installation SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) For the installation of the aft galley control module and the forward galley control module, do as follows (Figure 401) (Figure 402): (a) Connect the electrical connector (1). (b) Put the galley control module (3) in its installation position. (c) Attach the three Dzus fasteners (2). (2) For the installation of the outboard galley control module, do as follows (Figure 403): (a) Connect the electrical connector (1). (b) Put the galley control module (3) in its installation position. (c) Attach the three Dzus fasteners (2). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 33-29-01 Page 7 of 8 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) On the RH electrical-power control/distribution box (AMM SDS 24-60-00/1), close the circuit breakers below and remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag from them. • GALLEY (Location Tip: RB SHED DC BUS 2/GALLEY). • GALLEY (Location Tip: RB SERVBUS/GALLEY). (2) Do the Galley Lights test ( AMM TASK 33-29-00-700-801-A/500). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 33-29-01 Page 8 of 8 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
